name: MySavingsLord
0:
”Alexa, open my savings lord”
”Two in Coffee”
”Report this month”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my savings lord
Developer Terms of Use
des: Select the month, book expenses, report it and send all the details to your email. Start by saying "open my savings lord", say where you spend your money, ask for a report and finally ask Alexa to send you by mail all the details.
